snippet: Mark Todd and Andrew Nicholson will compete at their seventh Olympics after being placed on New Zealand’s five-member equestrian team for the London Games.
abstract: Mark Todd and Andrew Nicholson will compete at their seventh Olympics after being placed on New Zealand’s five-member equestrian team for the London Games.
lead_paragraph: Mark Todd and Andrew Nicholson will compete at their seventh Olympics after being placed on New Zealand’s five-member equestrian team for the London Games.

headline.seo: New Zealand Equestrian Duo Head to Seventh Olympic Games
